item.description:
I have a wonderful dance studio and meeting place in Stamford,-every year all our professional dancers choreograph a fantastic show and dinner dance. This year we are putting one on based on broadway auditions, and movie numbers. This is a night for every age. There will be a wonderful dinner and dessert with social dancing afterwards. Performances by competitive dancers and lovers of dance-part of the proceeds will help us to get our childrens program off to a good start to teach them ballroom, and also to help me with my surgery of my foot while I am out. I hope you can all make it. Tickets are $75 for all of that - but because of Denise we will do tickets for $60 if you send checks in before Sept. 20- We will do a special meetup table. I would love to have you all there. Get dressed up and share a night of music and dance -from Tangos to swings to foxtrot to club.

there will also be dancing for everyone to party to

RSVP-BY SEPT. 20TH FOR PRIME SEATING

Send checks to Maria Fioras Dance Downtown 201 Summer Street Stamford,CT 06901 for more info 203-353-4363

CLICK LINK TO SEE DANCERS IN REHEARSALS

http://www.fabulousfacesbylisa.com/MariaFioraDanceStudio/The-Tango/18934691_PTfJGj#1469294978_cgnPpPB-A-LB

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE" Come enjoy a night of food - wine - Dance
